products.title: Paleo Linen Persian Blue Roman Blind
products.description: There's a neutral, pastel tone to this blue fabric that makes it a cinch to match into many schemes, but will look particularly at home when enhanced by a few blue highlights or combined with modern grey shades. The sumptuous softness of the linen-look fabric can't be overstated there's a neutral, pastel tone to this blue fabric that makes it a cinch to match into many schemes, but will look particularly at home when enhanced by a few blue highlights or combined with modern grey shades.
